title: Global Settings Search
content:
From SmartWiki
 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
The Global Settings page has a search box on the action bar to search all available links on global settings.
Users will be presented with options that contain the search criteria as they type into the Search field.
They can click on any of these returned results and will be taken directly to the relevant configuration section.
 
 Retrieved from ‘
https://wiki.smartsimple.com/index.php?title=Global_Settings_Search&oldid=30845
’
